Question: Tack One Pte Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Tack One Pte Ltd

Product: Tack GPS Plus

- Empowered by AI and cutting-edge technology
- Extended 30-day battery life on a single charge
- Affordable subscription fees starting from $2.95 monthly for a two-year plan
- Amalgamates GPS, Wi-Fi, IoT mobile network, AI, and smart sensors
- Patent-pending indoor elevation finder feature for accurate tracking in multistory buildings
- Diverse applications including caregiving, personal and family security, disaster prevention, and asset protection
- OurSphere mobile app for seamless monitoring and real-time location sharing
- Global expansion to over 120 countries with a focus on key markets
- Founded in 2020, secured $300,000 in seed funding
- Available on official website with subscription plans at $3.95/month for one year and $4.95/month for a month-to-month plan
Summary_cn:
Tack One Pte Ltd

产品：Tack GPS Plus

- AI和尖端技术赋能
- 单次充电可延长30天电池寿命
- 价格实惠的订阅费，从每月2.95美元起，为期两年的计划
- 融合了GPS、Wi-Fi、物联网移动网络、人工智能和智能传感器
- 用于多层建筑准确追踪的专利待审室内海拔发现功能
- 多种应用包括照顾、个人和家庭安全、防灾和资产保护
- 我们的移动应用程序OurSphere，实时监测和位置分享
- 全球扩展到120多个国家，重点关注关键市场
- 成立于2020年，获得30万美元的种子资金
- 在官网上提供订阅计划，一年3.95美元/月，月付4.95美元/月
